description.@en: Do not toy with me, for I see who you really are . . .

effect.@en: After successfully casting, you immediately learn the Disposition of one person you can clearly see and hear.

criticalSuccess.@en: In addition, you can discern whether they are being truthful or telling lies when you speak with them directly.

criticalFailure.@en: You are unable to tell the truth, and it is apparent to everyone who interacts with you.

reagents.@en: A glass or metal receptacle with a closing lid
